description: Kotobuki Shiiko (C-ko) is http://anidb.net/ch19892 [A-ko]`s best friend and has depended on her since they met in kindergarten. C-ko can be considered quite childlike. She is described as cute and innocent, tends to be hyperactive, and, in the Japanese version, frequently refers to herself in the third person. C-ko can often be sensitive and immature, and because of this, she has a tendency to cry. Sometimes she can also be selfish and possessive. Nevertheless, she is generally a nice, caring, and trusting person, especially towards her friend A-ko, and she usually means well.
name: Kotobuki Shiiko
